pages.services: Our services: technical maintenance, repair, tuning, and more at AutoCraft360 Main Services Unlocking Excellence: Our Array of Services Discover a realm of automotive and motorcycle mastery with our comprehensive suite of services. From routine maintenance to bespoke customization, we're your one-stop destination for enhancing your driving or riding experience. Our Evolution: From Vision to Versatility Embark on a journey through our company's evolution, from humble beginnings to a diverse portfolio of services. Explore how our commitment to innovation, customer satisfaction, and industry expertise has propelled us to new heights in the automotive and motorcycle realm. Visionary Leadership Our journey began with a vision to redefine automotive and motorcycle services, driven by a team of passionate experts dedicated to excellence. Customer-Centric Approach We have always prioritized customer satisfaction, tailoring our services to meet the unique needs and preferences of each individual client. Continuous Innovation Through relentless innovation and adaptation, we have stayed ahead of the curve, introducing cutting-edge technologies and techniques to enhance our service offerings. Strategic Partnerships Collaborating with industry-leading partners has allowed us to expand our capabilities and provide a wider range of services to our valued customers. Commitment to Excellence Our unwavering commitment to excellence has been the driving force behind our growth, earning us a reputation for quality, reliability, and professionalism. Our Services Explore our comprehensive range of automotive and motorcycle services designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Technical Maintenance and Repair Keep your vehicle running smoothly with our expert technical maintenance and repair services. Regular servicing (oil change, filter replacement, etc.) Engine diagnostics and repair Brake system inspection and maintenance Bodywork Repair and Restoration Restore your vehicle's appearance and structural integrity with our bodywork repair and restoration services. Dent repair and removal Scratch repair and paint touch-up Collision damage restoration Tuning and Performance Enhancement Maximize your vehicle's potential with our tuning and performance enhancement services. Engine tuning for increased horsepower and torque Suspension upgrades for improved handling and performance Exhaust system modification for enhanced sound and power Sales and Installation of Additional Equipment Enhance your vehicle's functionality and style with our sales and installation of additional equipment services. Installation of aftermarket audio systems Upgrade to high-performance tires and wheels Installation of custom lighting kits Consultation on Parts Selection and Installation Get expert guidance on selecting and installing the right parts for your vehicle. Guidance on selecting the best performance parts Assistance in choosing tires for specific driving conditions Help with selecting and installing vehicle accessories Service Programs and Maintenance Plans Ensure your vehicle's longevity and performance with our service programs and maintenance plans. Tailored service packages for different vehicle models Scheduled maintenance plans for regular upkeep Seasonal maintenance packages for winterization or summer preparation Pre-purchase Vehicle Inspection and Diagnostics Make informed decisions with our pre-purchase vehicle inspection and diagnostics services. Thorough inspection of used vehicles before purchase Diagnostic tests to identify potential issues Assessment of vehicle condition and reliability Fleet Maintenance and Upgrading Services Keep your fleet in top condition with our fleet maintenance and upgrading services. Scheduled maintenance to minimize downtime Upgrading vehicles with safety features or modern technology Fleet optimization consultation for improved efficiency Ready to Order? pages.index: AutoCraft360: experts in car maintenance and repair" Main Services Welcome to the World of Auto-Crafts 360 Welcome to Auto-Crafts 360 - your universal partner for car and motorcycle servicing and repairs. We offer high-quality services performed by experienced spacialists to ensure your vehicle is always in top condition. Our services include tachnical maintenance, repairs, bodywork, tuning, and more. Trust your vehicle to the professionals at Auto-Crafts 360 and feel the difference today. Ready to learn more about how we can assist you? Click the button below to fill out our contact form and raceive a free consultation from our experts. Get in touch Our Achievements in Numbers Discover the statistics that make Auto-Crafts 360 stand out. From customer satisfaction rates to years of experience, our numbers speak volumes about our dedication to excellence in car and motorcycle servicing and repairs. 98% Customer satisfaction rate 10 years Experience in car and motorcycle servicing and repairs 5000+ Successful jobs completed 24/7 Support availability Our Approach: Excellence in Every Detail At Auto-Crafts 360, our approach is defined by our commitment to excellence in every aspect of our service. From the professionalism and expertise of our team to our dedication to individualized care for each vehicle, we prioritize quality, transparency, and customer satisfaction. Discover how our approach sets us apart in the world of car and motorcycle servicing and repairs. Professionalism Our team consists of highly skilled professionals dedicated to delivering top-notch service. Transparency We believe in open communication and providing clear, honest information to our customers. Individualized Care Each vehicle receives personalized attention and care tailored to its unique needs. Quality Assurance We uphold the highest standards of quality in every service we provide, ensuring customer satisfaction. Customer Satisfaction Our ultimate goal is the satisfaction of our customers, and we go above and beyond to exceed their expectations. Commitment Our unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction and excellence drives everything we do. About Us Auto-Crafts 360 was founded in 2009 by two friends, Mark and Jason, who shared a passion for cars and motorcycles. Both had extensive experience in the automotive industry and were convinced they could create a company that would offer something special to customers. Since its inception, Auto-Crafts 360 has aimed to become a leader in car and motorcycle servicing and repairs. In its early years, they started with a small workshop, offering services such as technical maintenance and repair. Thanks to their high-quality service and excellent customer relations, the company's reputation grew, attracting more customers each year. Over time, the company expanded its services, adding bodywork repairs, tuning, as well as sales and installation of additional equipment to their repertoire. They also developed a loyalty program for repeat customers and actively participated in various events and exhibitions to expand their audience. Today, Auto-Crafts 360 is one of the leading enterprises in its industry, serving clients from around the world. Despite its growth and success, the company still adheres to its core values: quality, professionalism, and customer focus. Our Comprehensive Services Explore the wide range of services offered by Auto-Crafts 360 to keep your vehicles running smoothly and looking their best. From routine maintenance and repairs to customization and upgrades, we've got you covered. Discover how our expertise and dedication can enhance your driving experience. Technical maintenance and repair Bodywork repair and restoration Tuning and performance enhancement Sales and installation of additional equipment Consultation on parts selection and installation Service programs and maintenance plans Pre-purchase vehicle inspection and diagnostics Fleet maintenance and upgrading services Ready to experience the difference? Dive deeper into our range of services and discover how we can elevate your driving experience. Click below to explore our services in detail. Explore Services Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Got questions? We've got answers. Check out our FAQ section below for more information. How often should I service my vehicle? + We recommend servicing your vehicle every 6-12 months or every 10,000 km, depending on usage and manufacturer recommendations. Can you help with bodywork repairs and restoration? + Yes, our specialists can handle repairs of any complexity, including dent repair, scratches, and accident damage restoration. What tuning and enhancement services do you offer? + We offer a wide range of tuning services, including engine tuning, suspension upgrades, aerodynamic enhancements, and more. Do you offer service programs and maintenance plans? + Yes, we have various service programs and maintenance plans available to suit your needs, providing regular maintenance and other benefits for our customers. Can you assist with pre-purchase vehicle inspections? + Absolutely, we offer pre-purchase vehicle inspections and diagnostics to help you make an informed decision before buying a car or motorcycle. Do you provide fleet maintenance services? + Yes, we offer fleet maintenance and upgrading services to keep your company's vehicles in top condition and minimize downtime. How long does it take to complete bodywork repairs? + The time required to complete bodywork repairs depends on the extent of the damage. Minor repairs may be completed in a few hours, while more extensive repairs could take several days. Do you offer warranty on your services? + Yes, we stand behind the quality of our workmanship and offer warranties on many of our services. Please inquire about specific warranty terms for your service. How can I schedule an appointment for service? + You can easily schedule an appointment for service by contacting our team via phone, email, or through our online booking system. We'll be happy to assist you. Do you provide emergency repair services? + Yes, we understand that emergencies happen, and we offer emergency repair services to get you back on the road as quickly as possible. Contact us for immediate assistance. What payment methods do you accept? + We accept various payment methods, including cash, credit/debit cards, and bank transfers. Please inquire about specific payment options when scheduling your service. Can you provide references or customer testimonials? + Yes, we can provide references and testimonials from satisfied customers upon request. Feel free to ask our team for more information. Are your technicians certified and experienced? + Yes, our technicians are highly trained, certified professionals with years of experience in the automotive and motorcycle industry. You can trust your vehicle in their capable hands. What should I do if I have a problem after the service? + If you encounter any issues after the service, please contact us immediately. We'll do our best to resolve the problem and ensure your satisfaction. Do you offer discounts or promotions? + Yes, we occasionally offer discounts and promotions on our services. Stay updated by subscribing to our newsletter or following us on social media. Can I cancel or reschedule my appointment? + Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment by contacting us in advance. We understand that plans may change, and we'll do our best to accommodate your needs. Get in Touch I accept Privacy policy Submit Services Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions +91 266 029922 autocrafts360@gmail.com 52/1, 1 Model House Street, Basavanagudi

pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | AutoCraft360: your privacy is our priority Main Services Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Welcome to our Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us. 2. Information We Collect We collect information from you when you visit our website, register on our site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, respond to a survey or fill out a form. 3. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect from you to personalize your experience, improve our website, process transactions, send periodic emails, and more. 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties without your consent. 5. Data Retention We will retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. 6. Your Consent By using our site, you consent to our privacy policy. 7. Accessing and Updating Your Information You have the right to access and correct your personal information held by us. You can update your information by logging into your account and editing your profile. 8. Security We take precautions to protect your information. When you submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline. 9. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via email at autocrafts360@gmail.com. 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website. 11. GDPR Compliance If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your personal data. 12. Effective Date This Privacy Policy is effective as of 05/01/2024 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, which will be in effect immediately after being posted on this page. 13. Children's Information Our website does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. 14. California Privacy Rights California residents may have additional rights over their personal information. For more information about your privacy rights in California, please refer to our California Privacy Policy. 15. Consent Withdrawal You have the right to withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data at any time. To do so, please contact us. 16. Data Protection Officer We have appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) to oversee compliance with this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices concerning your personal information, please contact our DPO at autocrafts360@gmail.com. 17. Data Breach Notification In the event of a data breach that affects your personal information, we will notify you via email within 72 hours of becoming aware of the breach. 18. Governing Law This Privacy Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. 19. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at autocrafts360@gmail.com. Services Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions +91 266 029922 autocrafts360@gmail.com 52/1, 1 Model House Street, Basavanagudi
